name: Pick 'n Stamp (LD33)
description:
- Created During Ludum Dare 33 -

Would you put a persons life in danger instead of your own?

You have a red dot pointed at you and you must choose who to kill and who to let live - but you wont know the consequences of each choice you make There are innocents and there are criminals and a person calling themself "Hero" wants you to choose or else to put it in Hero's words "I WILL KILL YOU AND EVERY F***ING PERSON YOU CALL FRIEND OR FAMILY"
What will you do?

CONTROLS -
  • MOUSE - To drag and drop
    HOLD LEFT CLICK - if you have the balls
    TOUCH - To drag and drop
    F - to Fullscreen
    ESC - exit fullscreen
